# [network]
# generateHosts = false
127.0.0.1	localhost
127.0.1.1	XPS15.localdomain	XPS15
# Fabric CA endpoints
127.0.0.1 org0-ca.localho.st
127.0.0.1 org1-ca.localho.st  
127.0.0.1 org2-ca.localho.st

# Orderer endpoints
127.0.0.1 org0-orderer1.localho.st
127.0.0.1 org0-orderer2.localho.st
127.0.0.1 org0-orderer3.localho.st
127.0.0.1 org0-orderer4.localho.st
# Orderer admin endpoints
127.0.0.1 org0-orderer1-admin.localho.st
127.0.0.1 org0-orderer2-admin.localho.st
127.0.0.1 org0-orderer3-admin.localho.st
127.0.0.1 org0-orderer4-admin.localho.st
# Peer endpoints
127.0.0.1 org1-peer1.localho.st
127.0.0.1 org1-peer2.localho.st
127.0.0.1 org2-peer1.localho.st
127.0.0.1 org2-peer2.localho.st

# The following lines are desirable for IPv6 capable hosts
::1     ip6-localhost ip6-loopback
fe00::0 ip6-localnet
ff00::0 iporg0-orderer4-admin.localho.st6-mcastprefix
ff02::1 ip6-allnodes
ff02::2 ip6-allrouters
